title: Two Times Reporters on ‘The Education of Brett Kavanaugh’
description: Robin Pogrebin and Kate Kelly discuss their new book, and Tim Winton talks about his most recent novel, “The Shepherd’s Hut.”
author: books@nytimes.com (The New York Times)
